course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Impact of Biotechnology on Daily Life
course.description: Over the past decades, the advent of biotechnology has transformed many aspects of our daily life. The recent deciphering of human genome will bring the relevant biotechnological applications to a new height. This course aims to keep students abreast of recent development in biotechnology and its impact on food supply, medicine, environment and the quality of life as a whole. Ethical and economic issues on biotechnology will also be discussed.
